thread.title: Wing Man Ada
thread.title_full: Vision Direct Australia reviewed by Wing Man Ada

author: Wing Man Ada
title: Wing Man Ada
text:
Ordered a pair of sunglasses with them for the first time.
The product that I received had problems.
I contacted them immediately and got quick response which is very good. and after few days of returning the product they sent a new product straight away. I'm pretty satisfy with this service even tho the first pair of sunglass with some problem with the original packaging and flame. but they provide quick service which is what customer need most. :)
